column4: I ask again, Can anyone give me assistance with installing the 64-bit Flash Player Plugin?
Really, not one person has an answer for me?
Just keep posting if no one listens, I miss a lot of stuff that scrolls past
- I have been, but I must admit it gets a bit frustrating
I agree, no one has answered my question about my brightness flicker issue yet
- well I have had a lot of experience with video settings perhaps I can help maybe I can help you
I have an Nvidia graphics card
what is the screen refresh rate at? just out of curiosity
are you using the nvidia driver or the experimental driver?
It only happens when the screen is dimming to go to sleep, and I can't change the brightness, it's as if something is forcing it at 100%
- so it doesn't actually dim to sleep it just flickers instead?
As the screen fades to black it flickers back to 100% brightness while it's dimming, once it's fully black it's fine
well that is a unique problem, there should be three drivers listed for your card perhaps you could try another one and see if the resolves the issue
other than that I am not sure I can help, that is a pretty odd problem
It's like something is forcing it to 100% brightness
I know, it reminds me of a problem my roomy had with Zoom Player in windows but I doubt my knowledge base on that will be of any help
